entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
